name: bitebase-intelligence
description: BiteBase Intelligence - Full-stack AI-powered restaurant intelligence platform

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000'
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && bash -c 'source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000'
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
